Summary: Lights just hovering in distance on 9/12/01 the USA was in a lockdown
divs: sighting detailswell i am not much for writing but i live up on a hill with a view of the western hemisphere and have 2 airports in my view as well. i watch planes take off and andland ecery night for 9 years all night long, this was just hovering in the western sky for about 25 30 min the distance was at least 15 to 20 miles away any movement was me not the object it was the days after 9\11 and all air traffic was grounded i just gonna let the footage speak for itself i have more footage just not enuff place to upload em
